ResearchProjectDef.label: Glyph deciphering
ResearchProjectDef.description: the symbols etched into Stargates—and scribbled across ominous scrolls—aren’t just artistic flair. Decoding them may unlock a galaxy-spanning transit network. Or a death trap. Possibly both.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Plasteel alloys
ResearchProjectDef.description: by combining Plasteel, Uranium, Naquadah, and Steel, our scientists have created an absurdly strong, absurdly unstable alloy.\nToo volatile for furniture, perfect for high-stakes wormhole shielding.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Irises
ResearchProjectDef.description: by placing an ultra-thin barrier mere microns from a stargate's event horizon, we can prevent reintegration of inbound matter.\nIn simpler terms: unwanted guests go *splat*. Handy.
